descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 15 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description:
You are trapped in a mysterious swimming pool. Observe the surroundings for any abnormalities and find a way to escape.

Escape method
Do not ignore any abnormalities.
If you find an abnormality, immediately return to the pool entrance.
If no abnormalities are found, proceed to the pool exit.
Once all abnormalities are discovered, find the real Pool No. 8 and leave through the exit!

Special tip
The game does not have particularly scary abnormal designs, so you can play with peace of mind.
The game duration is about 2 hours.
There are approximately 30 abnormalities in total.

Production Notes
This is an anomaly-finding game inspired by “Exit 8” and “FalseMall.”
It is also my first independently completed beginner project.
The level of game production still needs practice and improvement, so I ask for your understanding.
